header.title: Rishi Challa - Game Dev Portfolio
header.description: Creating games and artwork specialized in vector graphic and isometric perspectives.

about.title: About Me
description: Hi! I'm a full-time full-stack developer and aspiring game artist. I specialize in and enjoy working on vector art, especially those with isometric perspectives. I've worked with a variety of technologies and tools, but am most passionate about Rust and Bevy. This portfolio contains a lot of my concept art and even some finished games from game jams.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: A collection of my work from game jams to concept art. All artwork shown is vector-based, made with either Affinity Designer or Adobe Illustrator.

items.title: Waterfall Shrine
items.description: Concept art for a long-term RPG project. This scene showcases a dynamic isometric environment with waterfalls, vegetation, and a lore-rich fox statue that grants player abilities.

items.title: Are you a crow?
items.description: A tight 2d platformer made for the Secret Santa 2024 game jam. You start as a 'human' but slowly reveal your true form as a crow, gaining flight mechanics like double and triple jumps to navigate a perilous cloudy sky.

items.title: Soda Pop Rush
items.description: My first completed solo game jam entry. A physics-defying platformer where swimming in soda reverses gravity. Exploding soda cans provide infinite fluid sources for creative navigation.

items.title: Viral Defense
items.description: A biological tower defense game set inside the brain. You play as a virus destroying 'knowledge books' entering through the eyes and ears before they are absorbed.

items.title: Total Cardage
items.description: A side-scrolling shooter where you collect game chips to change your ship's firing patterns. My first ever game jam project, worked with a team where I did the artwork.

items.title: Farm Tools Survival
items.description: A survival farming game where you play as the tools themselves. Farm by day, but defend against attacking animals by night. Worked with a team, I did the artwork.

items.title: Space Whale Circuit
items.description: A 4-player party game. Play as a charge to traverse a circuit board in space. Summon the Space Whale to twist the board layout.

items.title: Forever Up
items.description: An isometric platformer where you must ascend rapidly to escape rising water levels. Features Lottie animations and Bevy Vello integration.

items.title: Horror Atmosphere
items.description: Concept art experimenting with horror atmospheres in an isometric perspective. Created entirely in Affinity Designer.

items.title: Data Bot
items.description: A data-themed platformer where you play as a robot navigating through cloud storage and graphs. Created for a data-themed game jam.

items.title: Isometric Dungeon
items.description: A college project where you navigate a triangle hero through lava, acid, and spikes. Worked with a team, I did the artwork.

items.title: Robo Delivery
items.description: An isometric puzzle game about delivering parcels to power up or power down lasers to clear your path.

items.title: RPG Desert Town
items.description: Concept art of a desert town over cliffs with an isometric perspective and a bookshop / spell shop.

items.title: Infinite Ace
items.description: A college project with a classic top-down infinite scrolling shoot 'em up. Defend the skies against waves of enemy planes.

education.degree: Masters of Science in Data Science
education.description: Emphasis on Reinforcement Learning, Natural Language Processing, and Deep Learning. Primarily with Python / Torch.

education.institution: University of North Carolina at Charlotte
education.degree: Bachelors of Science in Computer Science and Data Science
education.description: Concentration in AI, Gaming, and Robotics. Worked on several game dev projects here, also did some Machine Learning.
